Plot: A knight and his valet are plagued by a witch, and to repair the damage they make use of the services of a wizard. However, something goes wrong and they are transported from the 12th ...
Title: Just Visiting
Writer: Jean-Marie Poiré, Christian Clavier, Christian Clavier (screenplay), Jean-Marie Poiré (screenplay), John Hughes (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Reno, Christina Applegate, Christian Clavier, Matt Ross
tomatoConsensus: This remake of the French comedy Les Visiteurs ends up being a middling, forgettable effort -- not as good as the original.
